properties.areaDesc: Northern Rocky Mountain Front; Southern Rocky Mountain Front
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 2 at 3:23AM MST until January 2 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Great Falls MT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow occurring. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3
inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph.

* WHERE...Northern Rocky Mountain Front and Southern Rocky
Mountain Front.

* WHEN...Until 11 AM MST this morning.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Blowing snow could
also reduce visibility.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates near 1 inch per hour are
falling near Marias Pass this morning.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING
